decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing artifact creatures and artifacts that synergize well with each other to quickly and aggressively dominate the battlefield. It also includes disruptive spells to control the opponent's board and tempo, while simultaneously ramping up resources with cards like Mox Opal and Mishra's Bauble. The mix of card advantage, disruption, and explosive creature spells make it a formidable opponent in the Modern 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence and overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. It utilizes cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu to apply pressure early in the game, while also using Lightning Bolt as removal and reach. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding help protect your creatures and disrupt your opponent's game plan. Teferi, Time Raveler provides additional control and tempo advantage. The mana base is optimized for consistent plays and the deck aims to close out the game before the opponent can stabilize.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on fast and aggressive creature plays combined with burn spells to control the board and deal damage to the opponent quickly. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with a mix of low-cost creatures and powerful finishers like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury. The deck also includes support cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Guide of Souls to provide additional benefits to your creatures and maintain card advantage. With efficient mana fixing and a mix of removal and combat tricks, this deck aims to win through efficient aggression and board control.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd to apply pressure on the opponent while also disrupting their game plan with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Quantum Riddler. Consign to Memory and Solitude provide removal options, while Ephemerate and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker offer additional versatility. The deck aims to control the board and push for a quick victory by overwhelming the opponent with a mix of aggression and disruption.

This deck focuses on quickly playing artifacts to generate mana and control the board while dealing direct damage to the opponent. Utilizing cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Mishra's Bauble for card advantage, alongside powerful artifacts like Mox Opal and Urza's Saga, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. With a mix of control elements like Repeal and Metallic Rebuke, along with burn spells like Unholy Heat and Flame of Anor, the deck can deal damage efficiently and maintain board presence throughout the game.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The key strategy revolves around efficiently dealing damage to the opponent while controlling the board with cards like Goblin Bombardment and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury. The deck also utilizes cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to maintain pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of control elements like Thraben Charm and Voice of Victory helps to support the aggressive game plan. Overall, the deck aims to apply continuous pressure and close out games quickly.

The deck focuses on creating a fast and aggressive board presence while also disrupting the opponent with counter spells and removal. It emphasizes using Birthing Ritual to power out multiple creatures quickly, overwhelming the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Subtlety and Coiling Oracle for added card advantage and control over the game. It aims to curve out efficiently with cards like Shardless Agent and Fblthp, the Lost, while utilizing the snow lands for additional synergy with Ice-Fang Coatl. The inclusion of Gemstone Caverns and Boseiju, Who Endures provide additional flexibility and power in certain matchups.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and burn spells. The key strategy is to aggressively attack the opponent's life total while keeping up pressure with creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler. The deck also utilizes cards like Lava Dart and Lightning Bolt to clear the way for attacks and finish off the opponent. By quickly deploying threats and dealing damage, this deck aims to win the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with Eldrazi Temple and other lands to play powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Sire of Seven Deaths early in the game. It also includes disruption elements like Chalice of the Void to control the opponent's spells. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive Eldrazi creatures while maintaining control of the game with disruptive spells and lands.

The focus of this deck is to efficiently cycle through cards in order to quickly fill the graveyard with creatures. Once the graveyard is stocked, the player can cast Living End to bring all the creatures back onto the battlefield, providing a powerful and explosive comeback. The deck includes various cycling creatures and spells to facilitate this strategy, along with control elements like Force of Negation to protect the combo. The key is to carefully manage resources and timing to set up the perfect Living End play and overwhelm the opponent.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay using a mix of creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The key strategy is to flood the board with efficient creatures like Scion of Draco and Territorial Kavu, while using spells like Lightning Bolt and Stubborn Denial to control the board and protect your creatures. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding provide additional support and synergy with your creatures. The deck also includes some land destruction capabilities with Consign to Memory and Arena of Glory to disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on utilizing artifacts to quickly swarm the board with creatures and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By constantly generating artifact tokens through cards like Weapons Manufacturing and Pinnacle Emissary, while utilizing cards like Arcbound Ravager and Kappa Cannoneer to boost their power, the deck aims to close out games quickly with a relentless assault. The inclusion of cards like Tormod's Crypt and Engineered Explosives also provide disruptiveness against opposing strategies, making it difficult for opponents to mount a defense.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly and aggressively advance the board state using low-cost, efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler, backed up by burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart to clear the way for attacks. The deck also focuses on card selection and deck thinning with cards like Preordain and Mishra's Bauble to ensure consistent draws and maximize damage output. The goal is to maintain pressure on the opponent and close out the game swiftly before they can stabilize.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays and utilizing a diverse range of colors. With a mix of efficient creatures like Ragavan and Territorial Kavu, along with powerful spells like Lightning Bolt and Leyline of the Guildpact, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The inclusion of cards like Scion of Draco and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury provide additional power and versatility. Stubborn Denial helps protect key threats, while Arena of Glory can provide additional reach. The deck also includes some card advantage and tempo plays with Nulldrifter and Teferi, Time Raveler.

This Dimir Control Modern deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan through a combination of removal spells, counter spells, and hand disruption. Cards like Fatal Push and Pest Control handle creatures, while Counterspell and Force of Negation deal with spells. Thoughtseize and Cling to Dust target the opponent's hand and graveyard, while Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Quantum Riddler provide card advantage. The deck aims to control the game and outvalue the opponent with efficient removal and disruption, ultimately grinding them out and winning through incremental advantage.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly deploy a board full of small artifact creatures and utilize synergy with cards like Arcbound Ravager and Mishra's Bauble to maximize damage output. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Pithing Needle and Tormod's Crypt to control opponent's strategies. With the help of fast mana from Mox Opal and powerful artifacts like Engineered Explosives, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with aggressive plays and efficient card draw to maintain pressure on the opponent's life total.
